name: Escape from Fools
description:
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
Escape from Fools is a dynamic shooter with a nice design.
The game immediately sends into the thick of the battle, without making concessions to beginners!
The task of each level is to kill everyone. As you progress through the pumped reaction speed and ability to survive. He paused even for a second - the character is dead, so the levels have to be replayed several times. Destroy hordes of enemies, restore health, collect weapons and kill horrific bosses!

Features:
* Dynamic gameplay
* Nice pixel-art graphics
* Different types of weapons
* Different types of enemies
* Play mode for two
* Energetic soundtrack

Immerse yourself in the world of fools and idiots and escape from there!
developers: D Y N A M I C
